Name: Rosepetal Staff
Script: On Execute: var p = 0; for(d in actualdice){ if(d.basevalue == 3 # d.basevalue == 5){ p += d.basevalue - 1;} } if(p > 0) inflict(POISON| p);

Name: Rosepetal Staff_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var p = 4; var d = actualdice[0]; if(d.basevalue == 3 # d.basevalue == 5){ p += d.basevalue - 1;} if(p > 0) inflict(POISON| p);

Name: Rosepetal Shield
Script: On Execute: var s = 0; for(d in actualdice){ if(d.basevalue == 3 # d.basevalue == 5) {s += d.basevalue - 1;} } if(s > 0) inflictself(SHIELD| s);

Name: Rosepetal Shield_upgraded
Script: On Execute: var s = 4; var d = actualdice[0]; if(d.basevalue == 3 # d.basevalue == 5){ s += d.basevalue - 1;} if(s > 0) inflictself(SHIELD| s);
